document_data.name: Alair Nalabukhar
document_data.mainbody: '''Alair Nalabukhar''' was the fabled owner of an ''[[orb of power (Nalabukhar)|orb of power]]'' in the texts studied by [[Phelandern Ghemelt]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: According to the legends, Alair Nalabukhar, one young son of the extinct [[Nalabukharn]] family, had merged himself with an ''orb of power'' after his body had grown too mangled to live. He was somewhere in Faer√ªn.
